title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SANGGUNIANG BARANGAY OF BAMBANG ORDINANCE NO. 028, SERIES OF 2025, DATED SEPTEMBER 9, 2025 ENTITLED ”AN ORDINANCE ESTABLISHING THE BARANGAY COMMUNITY GARDEN OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ”HALINA'T MAGTANIM NG PRUTAS AT GULAY (HAPAG) SA BARANGAY, AND PROVIDING FUNDS FOR ITS OPERATION AND MANAGEMENT”.
